Overview of BiocPkgTools

Sean Davis

National Cancer Institute
seandavi@gmail.com

Abstract

Bioconductor has a rich ecosystem of metadata around packages, usage, and build status. This package is a simple collection of functions to access that metadata from R in a tidy data format. The goal is to expose metadata for data mining and value-added functionality such as package searching, text mining, and analytics on packages.

Functionality includes access to :

  • Download statistics
  • General package listing
  • Build reports
  • Vignettes

Build reports

library(BiocPkgTools)
head(bioc_build_report())
##   pkg version         author   commit last_changed_date    node    stage
## 1  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30 malbec2  install
## 2  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30 malbec2 buildsrc
## 3  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30 malbec2 checksrc
## 4  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30  tokay2  install
## 5  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30  tokay2 buildsrc
## 6  a4  1.27.0 Tobias Verbeke  52d6c2b        2017-10-30  tokay2 checksrc
##      result bioc_version
## 1 NotNeeded          3.7
## 2        OK          3.7
## 3        OK          3.7
## 4 NotNeeded          3.7
## 5     ERROR          3.7
## 6   skipped          3.7

Download statistics

head(getBiocDownloadStats())
##   Package Year Month Nb_of_distinct_IPs Nb_of_downloads     repo
## 1 ABarray 2017   Jan                105             153 Software
## 2 ABarray 2017   Feb                155             229 Software
## 3 ABarray 2017   Mar                119             216 Software
## 4 ABarray 2017   Apr                184             272 Software
## 5 ABarray 2017   May                192             282 Software
## 6 ABarray 2017   Jun                173             285 Software

Package details

require(dplyr)
bpi = getBiocPkgList()
bpi %>% 
  filter(Package=="GEOquery") %>%
  pull(importsMe)
## [[1]]
##  [1] "AnnotationHubData" "bigmelon"          "ChIPXpress"       
##  [4] "coexnet"           "crossmeta"         "EGAD"             
##  [7] "minfi"             "MoonlightR"        "recount"          
## [10] "SRAdb"
